sentences.sentence: Voters wish to register their dissatisfaction with the ruling party.
sentences.translation: 选民们希望表达他们对执政党的不满。

sentences.sentence: Many people have expressed their dissatisfaction with the arrangement.
sentences.translation: 许多人表示对这一安排不满。

sentences.sentence: She has already expressed her dissatisfaction with this aspect of the policy.
sentences.translation: 她已对政策的这方面表示了不满。
